item.title: The Classics EP 6: The Shadow People Invasion
item.itunes:title: The Shadow People Invasion
item.description:
Today we search for hidden treasure then delve into my creepy past as I recount my experiences with the Shadow People!

 

Forrest Fenn took over $1,000,000 in treasure and buried it somewhere in the Rockies. He then wrote his autobiography and filled it with clues that would lead to these hidden riches. Several have tried to find it, four people have lost their lives looking for it. Can anyone solve his riddle and become a millionaire?

 

Then we go back to the year 1997 and I will tell you about my personal and terrifying encounters with the mysterious beings known as the "Shadow People."

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Links:

 

Well Over $1 Million in Buried Treasure: Find it!

https://www.huffpost.com/entry/over-1-million-in-buried_b_822894

 

A DEADLY HUNT FOR HIDDEN TREASURE SPAWNS AN ONLINE MYSTERY

https://www.wired.com/story/forrest-fenn-treasure-online-mystery/

 

Fenn treasure

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fenn_treasure#cite_note-11

 

Man accused of breaking into Forrest Fenn's house seeking $25K

https://www.kob.com/new-mexico-news/man-accused-of-breaking-into-forrest-fenns-house-seeking-25k/5115349/

 

Forrest Fenn's $2M Treasure Is a Hoax, Says Ex of Man Who Died Looking for It

https://www.westword.com/news/forrest-fenns-2m-treasure-is-a-hoax-says-ex-of-man-who-died-looking-for-it-8240120

 

Shadow person

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shadow_person

 

In Case You Were Wondering, Shadow People Are NOT Ghosts - Here's Why

https://www.ranker.com/list/differences-between-ghosts-and-shadow-people/jacob-shelton

 

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Reptilian Strip Song EP 374: “Empty Beds”

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
